Containers.Name: DockerRegistry
Containers.Description: The Docker Registry allows you to run a private Docker Registry instance that you can push your images into [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : this is where Docker Registry will store it's databases and configuration.[br][br] [b]Tip:[/b] This template was created by modifying the PlexMediaServer template so I'm not sure I've got it right yet...
